details.sectionContent: You are welcome to the gaming zone, we'll give you the real flight experience.
This event will test the general and technical knowledge as well as gaming skills by means of flight simulation.
It is combination of NaamKaran and draw it. Let's show the true spirit of pro gamer by identifying the arena.  Draw it includes the drawing of technical objects in short period of time.
Participants will be introduced to flight simulator and basic controls in cockpit
A virtual experience of flight simulation will be experienced by short listed candidates

Date: 21/02/2018 
Round 1: 11:30 AM to 12:00 AM (C-113/114[Aero Department]) 
Round 2: 1:00 PM to 2:15 PM (SEMINAR HALL) 
Date: 22/02/2018 

Round 3: 10:30 AM to 11:30 AM (Aero SEMINAR HALL) 
Round 4: 12:30 PM to 1:30 PM (Aero SEMINAR HALL)
